replies.body: Another patch and yet no changes to the a lot of the big problems. (Urgot, Akali, Irelia, Aatrox and Kaisa)
If it was a big problem it would be in the patch though.

Are you fucking stupid maid, its a big problem kai'sa is perma pick and banned its a big problem and one of the most complained things in high elo, it has been like this shit for weeks and its pissing me off leblanc, kai sa, irelia and urgot are always picked and banned and you are telling me it isn't a big probelm you've got to be out of your fucking mind to think that. Dumbass
the gotta sell popstar kaisa tho b4 the nerfs
Remember that one time they were gonna bugfix Mordekaiser?
Morde just wouldn't be the same without 100+ bugs
Someone wrote entire book on the bugs Morekaiser has. I don't think they're going to fix him at this point.
lol i guess kat doesnt exist
I miss old Katarina tbh.
They will most likely do changes after Worlds. Also I don’t see Urgot taking a nerf but just the rune Unsealed Spellbook that actually makes him viable.

> They will most likely do changes after Worlds. Also I don’t see Urgot taking a nerf but just the rune Unsealed Spellbook that actually makes him viable.

Unsealed spellbook is not OP and is not whats making urgot viable. He is a ranged-tank lane-bully scaling tank shredder. He's OP because he's too hard to kill, not because of spellbook. It's the same reason why Gnar is a huge balance problem, because he's a ranged-tank hyper-scaling tank shredder.
I look forward to no longer perma banning graves
so now I can perma ban Akali {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
But the nerf is so slight
3 ad omegalul

Hello? is riot games fucking retarded, another patch and no nerf to the major champions in this game. May i remind you morons that Kai'sa Irelia Akali leblanc and alistar is all i see Banned and played and you still dont change it, can you stop thinking about the snobby pro players and start giving a fuck about the millions of players playing ranked, everyone bans and picks those champions and everyone complains about it and you still go another patch without nerfing it.
{{champion:84}} and {{champion:145}} are members of K/DA... so they want to sell the skin before doing anything that would hurt their profit$.
That 3 AD loss sure will knock Graves down a peg! {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Actually a pretty big nerf for jg. Kind of like when they reduce base armor to nerf, it makes clears slower and less healthy.

Less healthy clear and graves don't go together. When played properly, Graves can avoid almost all damage and comes out of the jungle with full health due to his kiting ability with e and his autos knocking back monsters.
I was reading the notes in class and yelled "are you fuckin serious why is graves getting nerfed?"
something something one of the strongest junglers in the game that is almost 100% picked or banned
That’s not true though?
His pick/ban percentage is below 15% according to champion.gg. Graves is annoying but don’t spew bullshit like you know what you’re on about
22% pick rate on op.gg
and the whole class clapped

"Added an icon to your profile to check if you're eligible for this year's Victorious skin. Hover over it to find out what you'll earn!"

but where doe? Ain'tcha' just gotta be gold for victorious? Or did something change?
Literally wondering the same thing it's not even there lmao
Riot answered: the icon is coming, but is not implemented yet

Did they say when it was going to be implemented then?
Patch notes so misleading x.x
Thank you.  Was literally here looking for the same answer.
when will they buff ivern?
{{champion:427}} AMEN! {{champion:427}}
As a Graves player, I just wanted to say thank you for nerfing my champion, now he may be banned less and I'll be able to win more games! Thank You Riot Games!
That's not a nerf LUL -3 AD that's nothing
It's actually a good start. I hope they nerf him more in the future.
just remove his W slow and nerf(revert) base HP and we are good
I would honestly half the grit per stack, and change how cleaver works with pellets/crit strike, but I agree with the hp scaling revert too
fix everything{{champion:84}}
Can you please fix rek'sai's tunnel bug where when she creates one over a wall, sometimes she doesn't go through?? please, it's been in the game for more than a year.
Unless Rek'sai gets some sweet skins, and a lot of people are buying it, they aren't going to fix bugs. Just ask Mord.

This may be the stupidest patch I've seen since I started playing in early s4... You have MASSIVE balance issues with champs like Kaisa, Akali, Urgot, Aatrox, etc and you nerf... Nami? Ahri? Eve? What the actual fuck are you guys doing...?
I have a feeling this new ezreal is gonna need a lot of nerfs. I like the new amumu skin and his chromas.

So... No one's gonna touch Ryze, Reksai, Skarner, Azir, or Ornn? They're some of the lowest win rate in their lanes and for the most part they're severely underplayed. Can we do something about that, like make them more relevant, I know ornn's abilities and passive make him hard to lane against as he almost never needs to back, but he's super mana hungry and can hardly sustain lane against champs that don't use mana. Skarner is a weird jg, his tactic is build full speed and tank, but when it comes down to it, he has one stun which is on a huge cooldown that only lasts for a few seconds on a single person, just like malzahar's but doesn't do damage. Skarner's slow is rather hard to use and gets slower the more things it goes through, kinda making it impossible to gank a lane that has minions in it. Reksai is just underwhelming, needs a bit more power to be relevant and useable in teamfights and solo hunts. Ryze... just sucks in general, might be easier to remove that champ or totally rework him. Well thats my senseless bitching done and over with.

Did you just ask for another Ryze rework? 
Also all of those champions are very strong in pro play or just with coordinated higher elo teams, making them very hard to balance. If you give any of them even a tiny buff they will become way too OP. They're all in pretty good places, they're just niche picks.
Is the Urgot excecute indicator coming too?
Still gonna ignore the permabans? I appreciate the Graves / Eve nerfs, but Akali? Irelia? Vladimir? Darius? Pyke? LeBlanc? Ekko?
?????? How on earth is ekko a problem? The rest don't really need nerfs either, akali does but irelia has been tweaked so much already
Because he has everything in his kit. You're honestly defending Irelia, though? The permabanned champ that's #1 for challenger players? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AUGi6tux3xY
